title: NFT for Real estate and Land
description: There is a critical issue in the real estate business; tax evasion, fraud in share companies and corruption in investment land allotment
solution: A niche NFT marketplace, where tokens represent the physical assets of land and houses in real estate and where people buy and sell.
experience: A Full-Stack & Mobile App Eng, tested Plutus playground, B.SC in Computer Science, 4.5 years, key connections, solidity smart-contracts.
